A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What can be said about this atrocity of a movie that has not already been stated? For me\, the saga ends with The Force Awakens. I'm going to pretend that the last jedi & all future Star Wars movies do not exist. JJA\, RJ & KK can go whatever direction they want with this property\, but I won't be along for the ride. I choose to keep my childhood heroes in their previous\, ulaltered state.
